title: Is anyone else disconnecting from the league client..?
body: Title. I've been d/cing a lot and can't get into any games since when I accept I'll disconnect! + my friend notifications go crazy.

replies.body: Yeah, we've received quite a few reports on players disconnecting and are looking into it deeper.  We've also put out some messaging on our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page and will continue to post updates.  Hang tight as we work towards a resolution!

If you're aware of a problem with players disconnecting, then why do you still have ranked on and loss prevention disabled? 
(fyi, this has been going on since 6 am this morning CST)
Having the same problem! I can get as far as champ select with my friends, but the chat keeps disconnecting, then we're kicked to the home screen. Friend suggestions are infinitely scrolling madness.
Omg yes! I also just found out apparently I can't start custom games since the start button doesn't work..?
